website_summaries.verdict: If you’re looking for something unique in a dry board, this is it. Great-looking and well-made, but it may take a little adjusting to get used to it.
pros: Stands out for its black glass, which gives this a cool high-tech look
Sturdy and mirror-heavy, but still installs easily with an enclosed template
cons: Highly reflective, which can interfere with anything written on it
Only works with very strong magnets
Uses liquid chalk or fluorescent glass markers instead of regular dry erase markers

customer_reviews.title: Best markers for a fancy board.
customer_reviews.text: The best markers I found to work with this board are the following: Coloré Chalk Markers (sold by Perfecto Gifts) CraftyCroc White Liquid Chalk Markers (sold by CraftyCroc)
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Best dry erase ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: We mounted to the back of a storage cabinet. When we need it we roll it out and flip it around! It looks high tech and there is no ghosting...in other words dry erase ink completely erases! The only negative is that it is very reflective....see the picture.
customer_reviews.author: J. Childers

customer_reviews.title: Mostly magnetic...
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these boards to use as Scrum boards with erasable magnetic pads. When the boards arrived we were surprised to learn only neodymium magnets would stick when the black side is facing out. We got creative, mounted the boards with the metallic side facing out and voila, success! The metallic color scheme works with our decor so we are pleased. If considering this board, be sure to get high strength magnets if the black side is planned to be displayed, otherwise flip to the exposed metal side and know that pad magnets will adhere well.
customer_reviews.author: PacNW419

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy: Backing has defects.
customer_reviews.text: There are two half inch areas where you can see the backing is damaged (when looking at it from the front). It doesn't prevent using the board but it's visibly unappealing. I at first thought this was due to the marker tray rubbing against it in the box, but on closer inspection I think they are manufacturing defects as they don't quite line up with the marker tray. I returned it and Amazon sent me a replacement, the replacement had the same problem except more so (more damaged areas than the first one).
customer_reviews.author: Benvenuti Sfondrati-Piccolomini

customer_reviews.title: Board looks great, easy to hang (change the provided dry wall ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write reviews, but will make an exception here. Delivered on time, well packaged, far cheaper than other options. Board looks great, easy to hang (change the provided dry wall anchors to the screw in plastic variety) and EXPO neon markers are really clear. Template provided is blank, but straightforward to use, some tolerance on the holes helps. Would recommend to anyone !
customer_reviews.author: Buzzard

customer_reviews.title: Sleek board, best for low light scenarios.
customer_reviews.text: I was able to install it by myself pretty easily by watching the video and using provided template; I used a drill to secure the anchors in place. I purchased the crafty croc neon markers and uv black light led tape which I attached to the marker tray. Looks pretty cool in my home office, easy to erase without streaks or ghosting. Only two minor complaints, very glossy so brighter rooms might suffer from glare and the magnetic backing is likely only good for stronger magnets, I have tried several household magnets but the slide down the face of the board over time. Overall happy with the purchase and I will use it heavily for both doodles :) and work!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Stout

customer_reviews.title: What a cool blackboard
customer_reviews.text: I got the large sized board in black. It is really cool and sophisticated looking. Walking into the room it looks like a flat screen TV. Installation was easy but you have to measure twice and then double check again to make sure the 4 bolts are properly aligned with the blackboard. That's not a negative but an essential think to do. Even if you don't have wall studs in the needed location, the toggle bolts they supplied are high quality and sturdy. The neon colored pens look fantastic too. I liked the board so much I just ordered another one. You can't go wrong with this blackboard.
customer_reviews.author: Bob M

customer_reviews.title: Just what my office needed.
customer_reviews.text: I had a hole behind by desk I decided to fill with a small bulletin board. But the cork boards are a bit tacky. The glass magnetic board filled the bill much better in terms of both looks and utility. Installation is easy provided you forget about the anchors provided and use the plastic anchors that screws into the dry wall. The only caution is to measure accurately; there isn't any give in the glass to force a hole over a misaligned anchor.
customer_reviews.author: John F. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Use the included template with a level. It will make your life really easy.
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest office tool I’ve purchased in a long time. It was very simple to install. However, I have trust issues when it comes to drywall anchors, so I used some heavy duty aluminum anchors that were compatible with the screws included in the packaging. Had the thing on the wall and level within five minutes of it getting to my house. The board itself arrived undamaged and beautiful. Writing on a black dry erase board will take some getting used to, but I think I’ll manage just fine. I only wish it came with markers and more magnets to start me off.
customer_reviews.author: JMS

customer_reviews.title: Great value after second order!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great product for the value. The first one I ordered did not survive shipping and the communication from Amazon (or the manufacturer) was not good. They said it was shipped but it just never arrived. Would have been nice to hear “Sorry, it was damaged during shipping” or something similar. However, I was able to reorder it, the new one came in good condition. It was about 30 minutes to mount it using the handy template they ship with it and now it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Sosnowski

customer_reviews.title: Board looks great!
customer_reviews.text: The board looks fantastic and I love it. However, it would be nice if the template is premarked. The magnetic one has an uneven back, and it makes it hard to make the marks just to be 100% perfect. yo;u can get close. The template is the same size as the whiteboard, so I don't understand how it isn't able to be premarked
customer_reviews.author: Ashkir

customer_reviews.title: Low quality manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: Manufacturing quality is very bad. The glass had very visible white scuffs/imperfections that are definitely manufacturing defects. Very low quality manufacturing and no QC before they package it. Typical low quality Chinese made junk. Also it is very glossy. Cant’s see anything if there is a window behind you. All glare.
customer_reviews.author: tpdx

customer_reviews.title: Looks fantastic in my office
customer_reviews.text: Currently have this thing anchored to my office wall and it looks beautiful. I’m not a super handy kind of guy, I usually hire people to do everything. But the instructions for this made it super simple for me to do my self. You might need one other person to hold the glass in place as you mount but other then that it’s super simple. They include a wall template so you can easily make marking on your wall without guessing or busting out the measuring tape.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Parra

customer_reviews.title: Organize your day
customer_reviews.text: I have received so many complements from my colleagues. This board helps me to stay organize because I write all of my tasks down and check them off. Beats paper and multiple notepads.
customer_reviews.author: WillA

customer_reviews.title: Arrived In Good Shape
customer_reviews.text: The board (36 x 48 version) arrived in good shape with no scratches or dents and was installed without issue. I work at a university so we had the maintenance team install it and they were happy that there was a template to help. It looks good and feels solid. I bought a set of neon markers and white chalk markers (Expo and Crafty Croc) that write well on it but not as much of a contrast as I'd hoped but still more than satisfactory. I also bough a Quartet eraser that works fine at erasing with a little effort. So far worth the money and meets if not exceeds expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Functional Decor at a great value.
customer_reviews.text: Love it, functional decor. We put this up in our home gym, works perfectly. Simple to hang, but will want someone holding board up and a second person marking the holes. Used drywall anchors and held well. Saw a review about liquid chalk markers, so we got those. They are great and it really accents well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing magnetic board!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most beautiful whiteboards I have ever had. Amazing size, great quality. Comes with everything you need to install it, except for the power tools. One caveat to this: cleaning off neon pens (wet erase) is like fighting with your car's windshield. You will never, EVER get the board completely clean and will always have a white-ish haze.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Bewley

customer_reviews.title: Hard to erase
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful board, it’s sturdy and works great. The reason for the low review is because you can’t use regular dry erase markers. They are all the chalk type of liquid markers that require a lot of work to erase. I should have gotten a white one. I’m a teacher working from home. It needs to be easy to erase.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie L

customer_reviews.title: It could easily be mistaken for a protective sheet or packaging material
customer_reviews.text: Using the template they had in the box I was able to put this dry erase board up with no problems. The template is a white poster board, don't throw this out!!! It could easily be mistaken for a protective sheet or packaging material. I did not need any help and was able to hang this on my own. It looks great on the wall! Very happy with the product. There were no blemishes or dents as I've seen on other products. It also comes with an attachable tray to hold markers and what not, though I did not need something like this.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kulczycki

customer_reviews.title: Classy, Elegant, Kitchen Board
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Board! Heavy - like a mirror. Comes with wall anchors, but I would try and mount at least one side on a wall stud if possible. Very classy and professional looking. We have mounted it beside of our refrigerator in the kitchen and use it for grocery list and to remind us of items that might be hidden in our fridge that we don't want expire. We are using these markers with it
customer_reviews.author: ESVKTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Best Dry-Erase board ever
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy with this board for many reasons. It arrived 3 days early, it’s great quality and has no damage from shipping, hanging it was not hard at all, and it has a simplistic modern look to it. I would highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a Dry-Erase board. It has made studying so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Gray Chilton

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use this board to keep me on track with tasks that need to be done. I am getting so much more done now that it is written and on display. It looks great and is easy to clean. It hangs just outside the kitchen and I keep a running list of things my husband needs to do. No more "nagging wife"! He just needs to check the board and he can always find something to do.
customer_reviews.author: CF

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and securely wrapped. Easy to install and looks beautiful in our modern conference room. Product is heavy and very well made. We got the magnetic version which is very strong and holds paper nicely with a standard magnet. Love it so much we’re buying another one for our other office space!
customer_reviews.author: Avesmom

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable board, but be prepared to purchase mounting hardware.
customer_reviews.text: The mounting hardware they provide you with is not sufficient to mount the board to the wall, as I found when mine came off the wall and chipped one corner. It's less magnetic than my refrigerator, but a strong enough magnet will stick to it. I mounted mine(the second time) with 4 heavy duty anchors, with a thick metal washer between the board, and a thick rubber washer and a thin metal washer in the front. I painted the washers black, and it looks pretty alright.
customer_reviews.author: Walker Dow

customer_reviews.title: Works & Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: An excellent dry-erase board that doesn't look out of place in my living room. For the most part is was an easy and hassle-free installation. Though I got the largest size and it is pretty heavy but the included hardware seems to be doing it's job pretty well keeping it on my wall. The included magnets work pretty well too and are designed to not scratch the surface. It's somewhat spendy but I think it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: This is the blackboard you want.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and value for money. The difficulty of installation has been exaggerated in the reviews, I found it straight forward and all the steps were easy and logical. As others have noted, it is high-gloss surface so you should plan carefully where windows and light fixtures are so you're not reflecting light and losing utility of the black board. Any negative reviews I think stem from user error, the product itself is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R.

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to work with
customer_reviews.text: Wow a project that took as long as it said it would!!!!! Easy to put up and looks great! I wish I had more room to have put up a bigger one. If they could custom size......They would make a Killing! Looks super.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance J Malloy

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to hang up. It took me about 20-30 minutes total and took me and my husband only because he had to hold it in place while I screwed it on brackets. Neon markers showed up amazingly.
customer_reviews.author: B. Walton

customer_reviews.title: Get the holes exact and you'll be fine..
customer_reviews.text: I only had a slight issue hanging this, but not enough for me to make rate less than 5 stars. After marking the holes on the cardboard I taped it to my BRICK wall, and then used my hammer drill... Just a note, make sure when you work with brick you get the holes exact, otherwise you could have issues as glass does not flex very well... Luckily, a few taps with a hammer to one of the bolts allowed me to get this aligned correctly. Anyway, looks great in my basement-man-cave! Also, neon markers do not clean up well with a dry erase eraser, use a cloth or paper-towel (but that’s not the fault of the board).
customer_reviews.author: Chad S.

customer_reviews.title: False listing
customer_reviews.text: 4x3 shows it has six holes, yet product has four. Glass of this size on four tiny screws is not reassuring at all. Struggled to aligned with just two studs. Bought it ower other lower cost option hoping it has six holes as advertised. Fail.
customer_reviews.author: PowShred

customer_reviews.title: Amazing board.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for 2 and a half years. One of the best purchases I have made honestly. The people who sold it to me also forgot to include the promised magnets so they refunded me $20 and sent me extra magnets free of charge. I still remember it because it was such good customer service. As for the board, its great and VERY durable. The magnets are also strong as hell, they will snap together on your finger tips if you're not careful.
customer_reviews.author: leonel ramos

customer_reviews.title: These look beautiful hanging in our store
customer_reviews.text: These look beautiful hanging in our store. The only draw back is they are kind of hard to read at certain angles depending on the light reflecting off of them, but we have received so many compliments on how nice they look. We didn't use the included hardware to hang from wall, we used our own to hang from ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Katisa

customer_reviews.title: Very modern
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well-packaged. There was a slight small dent in the back but couldn’t see it in the front. Pretty heavy, so installing is a two person job. Incredibly easy to install and provided information for extra parts, which is pretty neat if I ever want to move my board elsewhere, or if I lose any parts. Came with 5 strong magnets for my board and a rack for my markers. Very reflective which isn’t my favorite but it’s a beautiful, modern board.
customer_reviews.author: Abster

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This board is Awesome! Installed it in my house for my kids chores and my workouts and just whatever else super easy to install very sophisticated look for the house.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Black Glass Makes The Colors Pop
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful black glass and fairly easy to install hardware. I use the "Liquid Chalk Dry Erase Markers" and it looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool Board.  Easy Setup.  Easy to clean and the kids LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest "black" white board I have ever used. I use this in my Recording Studio and the kids love it. They love to write on it with the Neon Markers. It seamlessly goes up onto the wall. The Magnets are really strong, but it does not ACT like a magnetic surface. I tried to put some refrigerator magnets onto it but they don't stick. The outer coating feels like glass which makes it super easy to clean! I don't think I will ever buy a regular white board after getting this!
customer_reviews.author: Amber FLYNN

customer_reviews.title: So much nicer than a white board!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It looks world nicer than a traditional white board. It cleans off really easily as well. It was easy to mount as well.
customer_reviews.author: Porter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Dry Erase Board
customer_reviews.text: It attached to the wall easily. Looks great and doesn't smudge too much. Very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Lofono

customer_reviews.title: this will look good in my
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those items I got for my teen daughter thinking that when she moves out someday, this will look good in my...kitchen? Office? etc. You get the picture. Installation was a little tricky but it was surprisingly smooth and no major issues. It looks great on the wall. I bought neon markers to go with it, but my daughter likes to keep the same thing up on it all the time. That's not the product's fault though. But she does use it, and it looks kind of artsy. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: Showed up shattered
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this showed up completely shattered. More than happy to reconsider the rating if we get a non-broken one. Update: was finally able to track down customer service and they issued a full refund, so that's great. I re-ordered a new and will update review upon receipt of non-broken (hopefully) board.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality Dry-Erase Board.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality glass, not a single imperfection. Made my own template from the included instructions (biggest instruction sheet I've ever seen with a product) and mounted everything spot-on the first time. Make sure before you start drilling into your wall that everything is level! I also centered mine on a stud for extra strength... not sure I would trust just the included drywall anchors that come with it. Looks great hanging in my living room!
customer_reviews.author: R. Brodowicz

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey, and I wish I had gotten a bigger one, but the product looks great. The template works, but it almost didn't fit on after I drilled out the holes and teied to hang the board. I had to really pull it over to get the last screw in, so be mindful of that. Otherwise I'm happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it is to write on and erase. Much nicer than a typical whiteboard. I recommend neon and white chalk markers. It is definitely a 2-person installation job!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: its NOT MAGNETIC. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the 6ft x 3 ft black magnectic glass.. Looks great but It is not magnetic at all. Its just glass. I was so excited until I realized its not magnetic and all the accessories I ordered don't work. Not sure if they sent me the wrong one or not but this ruined it for me. I was happy until I realized I had been duped.
customer_reviews.author: The Robot

customer_reviews.title: IT.IS.PERFECT.
customer_reviews.text: Ummmm, it's perfect. I previously purchased the wallpaper product (black) that served as a blackboard, but the ghosting on it drove me BANANAS. I just ordered this and it is PERFECTION, and looks brilliant in my office. No more fighting with removing chalk pens...I absolutely could not be happier with this product. Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: sunnyP

customer_reviews.title: Shipped with defects
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived intact, and the packing materiel was adequate, but after opening the box, a half-dozen "gouges" were present on the face of the product. Not large, but visible defects. Disappointing. I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: waiting... waiting

customer_reviews.title: It is beautiful but...
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this board and writing on it is easy but I am not happy with the magnet part of this item. It comes with several magnets that stick to the board but when I went to place a magnetic basket on the glass board it would not stick. I also purchased some magnetic frames to use for a display and they too would not stay on the board. Not sure I would make this purchase again :-(
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Best Customer Service Ever
customer_reviews.text: My entire organization is quite impressed with the customer service provided by AVD. I just purchased a black glass board from AVD, and am about to purchase a few more large white glass boards. More than happy to give AVD all our business to satisfy future needs.
customer_reviews.author: Larry G.

customer_reviews.title: Sleek & Eye catching
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in our Mudroom, anyone passing through compliments on it! My husband installed it without any challenges..use your makers, anchors. Will purchase another but larger for our office!
customer_reviews.author: EvaM

customer_reviews.title: Chic office board
customer_reviews.text: Excellent glass whiteboard! We discovered a few challenges: regular magnets won't work (not strong enough) and finding markers that are visible was a little tricky. White liquid chalk markers seem to work the best.
customer_reviews.author: AllisonMK

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT USE THEIR TEMPLATE TO DRILL HOLES!!
customer_reviews.text: Like the board but, COME ON!! It comes with a cardboard template for drilling the holes in your wall. Not only do the holes pre-cut in the template not match the guides printed on the template but neither the pre-cut holes nor the printed guides match the holes in glass!! How do you screw this up? Nobody tried hanging one of these before they mass produced them? Lay the glass over the template and use a marker to draw your own guides and you'll be fine. Use theirs the way it's intended and you will be very very angry. Good luck.
customer_reviews.author: Slicknut

customer_reviews.title: Nothing came with it just glass borad
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with absolutely none of the equipment it said in description. No mount. No markers. No tray for the markers
customer_reviews.author: paul settles

customer_reviews.title: Here are the magnets you will need
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and high quality board. As others have mentioned the challenge with this product is finding additional magnets that work with the board. The glass layer creates a gap between the magnet and the metal plate. It takes a powerful magnet with a wide surface to stick to the board *and* be powerful enough to hold items in place. After wasting much money and time, here are the magnets to purchase: 3/4"x 1/8" Disc - Red & Green Plastic Coated - Neodymium Rare Earth Magnet They are sold through Amazon but cost-conscious consumers should try a using search engine.
customer_reviews.author: Breven

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Buy It - good price and you will love it with CRAFTY CROC MARKERS!@#!@#!@#!@#!@
customer_reviews.text: Love these Boards Have 2 of them Easy Installation Packaging was nice Delivery was Quick and on time Smooth Good background support so to avoid breakage and cracks Love them boards !!!
customer_reviews.author: I

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Had no idea that a marker board could be this nice. Super heavy. This beast is gorgeous though! Will last a lifetime and looks really slick!
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Great!  I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is well-designed, easy to install/mount and great to use. I recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Trust me, you won't regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing product! The quality is top notch and the craftsmanship is second to none. It's durable and been in place for several weeks now without any issues. The installation template is something you won't find from cheap imitations and considering its heavy construction, will save you a lot of grief!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon's #7 Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clean lines and beautiful to keep a family organized
customer_reviews.text: We bought chalk/dry erase markers in vibrant colours to go with this. It is perfect for our organization, easy to clean and looks really good. The makes the colours stand out and easy to read. We have it on a white wall.
customer_reviews.author: Tencars

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful board
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful board. The setup took a little while but it was definitely worth it. The glass is sturdy and the magnets that came with the board work very well. Although other less magnetic ones won't work as well. Overall, I am very satisfied with my purchase !
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: This thing is so cool! Great way to keep organized in the main ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so cool! Great way to keep organized in the main area of our house without looking like a bunch of tacky paper charts. We use it for homeschool organization. I hope to get a few more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Quick install. Mark your holes in the cardboard it come with. Tape it on the wall, drill holes, place anchors and up it goes. Less than 30 minutes if you’re handy. Arrived in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Gardner

customer_reviews.title: I use different marker colors for each info so it's very easy for my eyes to go straight to what I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: It's tempered glass so you don't have to worry when erasing the surface it's scratch-resistant and stain-resistant (much much better than melamine in the long run) It comes with 4 screws to put it on the wall and 4 tops to cover the screws for aesthetic purposes. This is a high quality board and It looks amazing on my wall. I would definitely recommend this Item.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: The best blackboard I've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: The best blackboard I've ever had with fancy black background and neon markers - totally satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Yuriy A.

customer_reviews.title: Beware of weigh with drywall.
customer_reviews.text: Too heavy for the dry wall anchors with only four. Destroyed my wall.
customer_reviews.author: hdalsop

customer_reviews.title: Helpful company rep
customer_reviews.text: Timely delivery. Nice product. Talked with company rep who was very helpful
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Wells

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the office
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my new board that hangs in the office unlike other glassboards the writing is very clear... I'm going to buy a second one for my other wall.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: The pattern for drilling the holes is full size and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This company has implemented solutions for the complaints that I read about it. The pattern for drilling the holes is full size and easy to use. There is foam backing that sits between the board and the wall to prevent the middle of the board from flexing when you write on it. I would think that anyone could mount this on the wall with professional results on the first try... This was a fantastic upgrade to my office and I am 100% satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Badger

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful board with magnetic features!
customer_reviews.text: Love this board for work related activities in my home office! It was a bear to mount on the wall with the given hardware and need to go to the hardware store to get sturdier Molly bolts to hang it correctly! Other than that I am very happy with my purchase! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Sabine E. Seibel

customer_reviews.title: It was exactly what i expected it to be!  AAA+++++
customer_reviews.text: The board is very sturdy and was exactly what i was hoping and expected it to be. All the pieces came with it to help install. It was easy to install with a Drill Bit. Took about half hour to put on my wall.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking board
customer_reviews.text: This is a nicer looking board than available most other places. No problems. I switched out the wall anchors, as the ones it came with are cheap and useless.
customer_reviews.author: crazzydiamond

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic. Easy to set up and it makes studying fun. I purchased RBG lighting and set it up behind the board before hanging it up and it makes it look 10000x better lol. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo Jr

customer_reviews.title: Sleek
customer_reviews.text: Mounts fairly easy, you just have to be careful and precise, mark your dots, drill carefully etc... Looks very sleek and cool. Markers will never really glow on it but that's ok, it still works like a dry erase board.
customer_reviews.author: Iana

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING BOARD! GREAT PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT! It gives my home office the POP it needed. I hired professional hangers as I wanted it to be secure. It's very heavy! I order Artsy Rhino Liquid Chalk Markers.
customer_reviews.author: Earshler C. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love my easer board
customer_reviews.text: Love my easer board. It goes so well with all my other black furniture and it's so neat how it writes. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Poggio

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Cleans up easy, looks SHARP! A direct blacklight helps markers standout. This has made my basement bar look over the top. Kids get to put up goofy drawings, I can put up a menu/wine list/beer list/etc. Again, for best results proper lighting is important, an led directional blacklight is recommended!
customer_reviews.author: D. Berry II

customer_reviews.title: this particular one was free from all defects and fairly straightforward and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Have bought several of these over the years, this particular one was free from all defects and fairly straightforward and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Garlett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. I have used it on a daily ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I have used it on a daily basis at work for daily planning with staff. It's high quality and looks great in our office.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: amazing dry erase board
customer_reviews.text: awesome dry erase board. liquid markers are a must for the glass if you want to see what's written clearly. Cleanup is a breeze, hanging instructions are straight forward and easy to follow. Includes template for wall holes so that measuring is minimal.
customer_reviews.author: CHITownPete

customer_reviews.title: Great item and fits perfectly on wall
customer_reviews.text: The black glass dry erase board was ordered for my brother's bedroom so he could write math problem and other stuff that came to his mind. The item's dimensions included in the title helped were accurate and helped make the buying decision easier. Item arrived at the house in great condition and did not show any signs of damage after being shipped. Works great with Expo Neon Bullet Tip Dry Erase Markers.
customer_reviews.author: Benny Allen

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality maTerial
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality maTerial. I would recommend using the paper included with it to drill holes into the wall. Holes are exact, and does not leave much room for error. Very good product, strong magnets. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rmarkes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Most dry erase boards are flimsy or bend when you write on them. Because this comes with metal mounting brackets, is made of tempered glass, and is slightly removed from the wall, the typical warping and bending does not occur. For the money - at the time 69.99 - I cannot think of a better value. May get another to cover up some bare white wall space and make it more functional
customer_reviews.author: Tchitchikov

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It may be magnetic, but they don't tell you that you need special magnets. Regular magnets do not work!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A. Gadbury

customer_reviews.title: nowhere to hold pens or eraser. very hard to mount.
customer_reviews.text: My brother in law helped in stall this. Installation is not easy and the board they give you to measure with is off. However, once we got it up, it looks and works great. It doesn't have anywhere to hold pens or erasers though so we stuff cardboard behind it so we can place those on top of it. It be nice if they built a small shelf into it.
customer_reviews.author: no

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected. Also purchased the neon markers for it. People are always in my office looking at it. Glad I went with this rather than another whiteboard.
customer_reviews.author: S Reyn

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you'd expect!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! Looks sleek, easy to install, and the anchors work very well. Took no time to even put up. The best part: I convinced one of my naive friends that it is the newest and greatest thin TV with no buttons or border. After he sent photos to people informing them about it, I came clean =^) funny stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Scratched
customer_reviews.text: Opened the package and there was a foot long scratch across the board. Not sure how something like that makes it past QA.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: if it is magnetic or not
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a board but I meant to get a magnetic board. It fills the bill.
customer_reviews.author: S. Pipher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition, and it looks great in our workspace!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Braun

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived well protected and undamaged. Installation was easy and looks great in my office. A welcome change to the old standard white board. Only downside is that you must use the fluorescent markers. Others will not show up. The five magnets and magnetic eraser are nice additions to the board.
customer_reviews.author: SteveF

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: I look this black board. It adds style to my home gym. Definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this dry erase board.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be more in love. It is so sleek and discrete. It doesn't clash in my kitchen. Everyone who sees it wants it. I wish I had one more, but then that would be weird.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia O.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and packed nicely
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and packed nicely. Arrived with no damage and the black glass is fantastic. Not hard to mount. Just pay attention, follow instructions and its pretty easy to get done.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Karpchuk

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and easy to install if you take your ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and easy to install if you take your time. The kids and I fight over who gets to use it. the Linkyo markers work well with the board.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The delivery on this product was quick. It was really easy to put up and looks great. It might be only me but for some reason i thought it was a magnetic board however it's not (just in case someone is wondering) Definitely definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: VS

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive but it was not very magnetic, even using the magnets supplied.
customer_reviews.author: Mee

customer_reviews.title: It looks great and cleans up easily
customer_reviews.text: This board is exactly as advertised. It looks great and cleans up easily. Good size not to big or small.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Although packaging had no damage, the left-top corner of ...
customer_reviews.text: Although packaging had no damage, the left-top corner of glass was broken. I had to return it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: I use my board every day and I love it! I bought these markers for this type ...
customer_reviews.text: I use my board every day and I love it! I bought these markers for this type of board:  and they are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It looks really good in my kitchen. I have black wall tiles.
customer_reviews.author: Sovia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Kids love it. Looks cool on the wall and the colors just pop off it.
customer_reviews.author: CM

product_meta.title: Audio-Visual Direct Black Glass Dry-Erase Board Set - 23 5/8 x 35 1/2 Inches - (Non-Magnetic)
product_meta.description: Size:3' x 2'| Color:Non-magnetic BlackOur glass boards offer a modern, innovative look to any home or office setting. Each board comes with quality hardware, a full sized wall template, and an aluminum tray.
feature_bullets: Express Yourself - Our Smooth Glass Surface is Perfect for Neon Dry-Erase Markers.
Erase Effortlessly - Our Boards Clean Easily With One Swipe and Resists Ghosting and Staining
Cleaner and Longer Lasting Than Traditional Dry-Erase Boards.
Easy Installation - Includes full size Template, Aluminum Marker Tray, Solid Metal Mounts and Quality Wall Anchors
Peace of Mind - Each Board Comes with Lifetime Warranty and U.S. Based Customer Service
